The final part is a 0.25 units high, 0.1719 units wide, and 0.1719 units long three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. Join this part with the previous part.</description>

Draw the rectangle's third line from the point (0.0025, 0.0008) to (0.0, 0.0008). D. C. **Use the Thicken tool** with the combined region (two circular loops) and a thickness of -0.75 (depth into the model).
